home.title: David Dũng Savills
home.paragraph1: Specializing in central Ho Chi Minh City real estate, working with top developers such as Masterise Homes, Vinhomes, Novaland, Keppel Land...
home.paragraph2: Since 2017, David Dũng has supported many clients in buying, selling, leasing and investing in high–end apartments, shophouses, duplexes and penthouses, always prioritizing reputation and customer satisfaction.

about.title: About David Dũng Savills
about.paragraph1: I am David Dũng, a real estate consultant with over 7 years of experience, focusing on premium apartments, shophouses and central Ho Chi Minh City properties.
about.paragraph2: My strengths are deep understanding of legal procedures, sales policies of developers and helping clients optimize finance and cash flow when investing.
about.paragraph3: I have been cooperating with many major developers in the market, always working professionally, transparently and accompanying clients throughout the transaction process.
